name: Space-ball pool: Moon Shot
description:
8-ball pool, but you shoot by placing a star.

Gravity pulls planets, moons and stars towards each other when in range. 

Stars cause explosions when they collide with a planet or moon.

Click to place a star, or move the star to a different position.

Gravity only kicks in after you start your turn.

Win conditions:

-Opponents pots the moon before all other planets

-You pot the moon after all other planets have been potted

This is a proof-of-concept prototype done in 2 days. 

Bugs:

Turn based system skips player 1's turn sometimes.
